attributes.action: require all Government Departments and agencies to accept Cedit/Debit cards as a means of payment for their services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some Government departments and agencies refuse to accept credit/debit cards as payment for their services. In many cases this slows down the granting of, for instance, a licence by many days (by the time an invoice is sent, a cheque raised, the cheque allowed to clear etc etc).  If the law requires a licence be obtained before a particular activity is allowed, then HMG should make it as simple and as rapid as possible for the applicant to make a payment.  Credit/debit cards are accepted by many departments/agencies on Direct.gov and other government websites or by phone - in the early days of the 21st century shouldn't his be extended to all?
